    codon_finder

    codon_finder.Rmd
    library(saferTool2)


    Datasets 

    pos_set1 <- c(3, 7, 9, 12, 15) 
pos_set2 <- c(1, 4, 8, 11, 14)  
pos_set3 <- c(2, 5, 10, 13, 16)  
pos_set4 <- c(6, 13, 17, 19, 20) 
pos_set5 <- c(1, 2, 4, 8, 9)  
begin_value <- 0
end_value <- 20
begin_value2 <- -4
end_value2 <- 22
